4314520.name: DepotDash
4314520.description:
Fast-paced logistics chaos in a top-down construction yard simulator.

Take control of a busy construction depot where trucks never stop coming and every second counts. In DepotDash, youâ€™ll receive material deliveries from suppliers, unload them into your depot, and transport everything efficiently to the building zones using a growing fleet of industrial vehicles. Plan your routes, upgrade your machines, and keep the yard flowing or risk angry suppliers and total gridlock.

ğŸš§ Build the Flow

Trucks arrive constantly with fresh deliveries. Materials pile up in your depot dropzone, and itâ€™s up to you to move them quickly and safely to their destinations. Smart positioning, fast reactions, and clean logistics keep the site running smoothly.

ğŸšœ Upgrade Your Fleet

Start with a humble forklift, then unlock and master powerful machines:

  • Skid Steers

  • Wheel Loaders

  • Site Dumpers

  • Tower Cranes

Each transporter handles materials differently, encouraging creative solutions and efficient layouts as the yard grows more complex.

ğŸ“¦ Multiple Material Types

Begin with simple boxes, then expand into heavier logistics challenges:

  • Sand

  • Concrete

Each material adds new handling strategies and keeps gameplay fresh across later levels.

â™¾ï¸ Endless Mode Challenge

Complete the main objectives to unlock Endless Mode, where the pressure never stops. Keep your depot flowing as long as possible but beware: if trucks wait too long because your dropzone is full, suppliers get angryâ€¦ and the run ends.

ğŸ® Game Features

  • Top-down 2D construction yard simulator

  • Fast, satisfying logistics gameplay

  • Multiple drivable transport vehicles

  • Upgrade progression and increasing complexity

  • Fixed-objective maps plus Endless Mode

  • Chaotic fun with strategic depth
